summary: A new reusable purple mission target icon component was added and the WelcomeIntroScreen now uses it. However, the diff summary does not show the blue suitcase icon being replaced in the yellow page’s top-left UI location. There are also unrelated changes (e.g., URL parameter utilities) that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the existing “blue suitcase” icon with a minimal purple target/mission icon in all requested UI locations, including (1) the top-left icon on the yellow page of the app.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff clearly updates the welcome intro/onboarding icon, but the provided diff summary does not show any change to the yellow page’s top-left icon (no explicit replacement location is visible in the truncated changes).

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified URL parameter parsing and sessionStorage persistence utilities.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to swap a suitcase icon for a purple target icon in two UI locations and explicitly lists non-goals (no other functional changes). URL parameter utilities are unrelated to the icon swap.

hallucinated_features.description: Changes within MissionsFullScreenView beyond icon replacement (e.g., additional imports including `Target` from lucide-react, mission view logic context).
hallucinated_features.reason: The request is limited to replacing specific UI icons; modifications to mission screen logic or unrelated code are not requested. The diff summary indicates edits to this file but does not provide evidence that they are solely the requested icon swap.
